verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: I do not worship what you worship.
verse.verse_3: Nor do you worship what I worship.
verse.verse_4: Nor do I serve what you serve.
verse.verse_5: Nor do you serve what I serve.
verse.verse_6: You have your way, and I have my way."
